response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Given its significance, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,000,000, making it a remarkable investment for you. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product could enhance your business or personal endeavors.", "product_price": 950000}
